welcome.down.fail: Downloading the component failed. Restart the application to retry.
welcome.down.desc2: After this download, the speed of downloading files will be increased to 64 times that of the current one.
welcome.password.subtitle.l1: You have to set a password to keep your access token(s) safe.
welcome.password.subtitle.l2: Remember your password or your saved account will not be able to log in!
welcome.password.pwd.different: The password and repeat password are different
welcome.finish.text: That's all! You finished all the out-of-box settings!
open.title: Input your password to unlock the launcher
account.microsoft.desc: Account purchased on the official website
account.microsoft.create.desc: A Microsoft account is an account purchased from minecraft.net. It is an official account and no limits.
account.offline.desc: Account that can only access single player and offline multiplayer
account.offline.create.desc: An offline account can use even when you are offline. But it can only access single player and online-mode disabled server
account.injector.create.desc: An authlib-injector account will inject auth library to third-party. It's pseudo official account
home.title: Home
home.chooseVer: Click here to choose a version
home.chooseAccount: Click here to create and choose an account
down.title: Downloads
tool.title: Toolbox
mods.title: Mods
settings.title: Settings
settings.game.path.no: Select the folder where you want to storage game files
settings.recovery.reset.desc: Delete your all data and restart the app
settings.alert.reset.title: Are you sure to reset all data?
settings.alert.reset.content: Reset all data will remove all storages including saved accounts, and then the app will be restarted. Are you sure to continue?
settings.reload: You need to restart the app to apply these update
